petition-desc: Adds an [[Special:Petition|includable page]] to collect signatures, and for authorised users to [[Special:PetitionData|download signatures]] as a CSV file.
petition-form-share: Check this box if we may display your name, country and personal message publicly, and to release your personal message under a [//creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/ CC0 licence] (optional).
